Reviews.Title: “I like my staying in Madrid”
Reviews.Author: NadjaB1979
Reviews.Content: The hotel was fine, hotel personal were speaking english. Room was big enough for 2 of us, bad was cca 185 cm long. Room was clean and cleaning every day and the towels were changing. On the strop was stain, probablyo of water, it didnt badder us much but they should solve it.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, clean and smart”
Reviews.Author: grahamscooby
Reviews.Content: At £65 for a night it was great. Opposite side of town from the airport and a 60 minute metro trip but if your business is over that side then it's easy to get to as it's 2 minutes from San Francisco Metro. Staff were very helpful. Room very clean. Make sure you ask for the mini-bar key on check-in or you'll be going back downstairs. Tapas bar (untried) opposite. So glad we picked it

HotelInfo.Name: Egido Via Lusitana
HotelInfo.Address: Antonia Rodriguez Sacristan 14, 28044 Madrid, Spain
